name: Firefighter Fred
description:
Our educational apps transform complex math problems into fun adventures.
Information can be better understood, when it has a visual stimulus and can be applied
on an interesting problem, instead of just staying a theoretical mess of numbers. Let your
child become a brainiac by simply playing a game.
In our new app, kids learn how to use linear and quadratic functions to save aliens on a
distant planet form burning. The water beam must hit the right window. In our special
MathMode, kids can figure out the trajectory of the water and pick the function that goes with it.
We aim to bring the fun back into science!
